function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Visits to agricultural lands by older individuals outside of urban areas increases risk of contagious disease spread.","Impact":"Potential higher transmission of contagious diseases in rural areas due to older visitors with easy access to agricultural lands.","Mitigation":"Implement health and safety measures, conduct awareness campaigns, and limit the number of visitors to agricultural lands.","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, contact tracing apps, and remote access monitoring.","People":"Older individuals visiting agricultural lands, residents in rural areas.","Owner":"Local authorities, agricultural landowners, and public health organizations."},{"Description":"Visits to gardens by individuals residing in non-urbanized areas increases risk of contagious disease spread.","Impact":"Potential higher transmission of contagious diseases in non-urbanized areas due to visitors residing outside city limits.","Mitigation":"Implement health guidelines, promote sanitation practices, and limit the number of visitors to gardens.","Technologies":"Sanitation stations, crowd monitoring systems, and public health communication tools.","People":"Residents in non-urbanized areas, individuals visiting gardens with children.","Owner":"Local community leaders, garden owners, and public health authorities."},{"Description":"Visits to parks by younger individuals in urban areas increases risk of contagious disease spread.","Impact":"Potential higher transmission of contagious diseases in urban areas due to visits to parks by younger individuals.","Mitigation":"Enforce social distancing, conduct regular sanitation, and limit gatherings in park areas.","Technologies":"Social distancing monitoring apps, smart sanitation systems, and crowd size monitoring tools.","People":"Younger individuals visiting urban parks, residents living in densely populated urban areas.","Owner":"Local park management, city authorities, and public health agencies."}]}
